pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, May 19, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

The Deputy Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet Committee on the federal response to the coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

Closed to media.

12:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend the virtual meeting of the Special Committee on the COVID-19 Pandemic.
